properties.description: A word, phrase, character, or group of characters that constitutes the chief title of a resource.
properties.title: Title

properties.description: Type of title. (Opt.)
properties.title: Type

properties.description: Volume and issue information for periodicals.
properties.title: Periodical Details

properties.description: Volume number.
properties.title: Volume

properties.description: Issue number.
properties.title: Issue

properties.description: A term that specifies the characteristics and general type of content of the resource.
properties.title: Type of Resource

properties.description: A term(s) that designates a category characterizing a particular style, form, or content, such as artistic, musical, literary composition, etc. Using a controlled vocabulary such as http://www.loc.gov/standards/valuelist/marcgt.html is recommended.
properties.title: Genre

properties.description: The institution or repository that holds the resource or where it is available.
properties.title: Physical Location

properties.description: Select a role from this vocabulary - http://id.loc.gov/vocabulary/relators.html - e.g. Artist, Creator, Designer, Engraver, Illustrator, Photographer, Printmaker, etc.
properties.title: Role

properties.description: Information about the origin of the resource, including place of origin or publication, publisher/originator, and dates associated with the resource.
properties.title: Origin Information: Original Creation/Publication

properties.description: The date of creation of the resource. Enter date in the format YYYY-MM-DD.
properties.title: Date Created

properties.description: The date on which the resource was digitized or a subsequent snapshot was taken. Enter date in the format YYYY-MM-DD.
properties.title: Date Captured

properties.description: A date in which a resource is modified or changed. Enter date in the format YYYY-MM-DD.
properties.title: Date Modified

properties.description: The name of the entity that published, printed, distributed, released, issued, or produced the resource.
properties.title: Publisher

properties.description: Name of a place associated with the issuing, publication, release, distribution, manufacture, production, or origin of a resource.
properties.title: Place

properties.description: Information about the origin of the resource, including place of origin or publication, publisher/originator, and dates associated with the resource.
properties.title: Origin Information: Digital Creation/Publication

properties.description: The date of creation of the resource. Enter date in the format YYYY-MM-DD.
properties.title: Date Created

properties.description: The date on which the resource was digitized or a subsequent snapshot was taken. Enter date in the format YYYY-MM-DD.
properties.title: Date Captured

properties.description: A date in which a resource is modified or changed. Enter date in the format YYYY-MM-DD.
properties.title: Date Modified

properties.description: The name of the entity that published, printed, distributed, released, issued, or produced the resource.
properties.title: Publisher

properties.description: Name of a place associated with the issuing, publication, release, distribution, manufacture, production, or origin of a resource.
properties.title: Place

properties.description: Select a three letter iso639-2b language code from http://www.loc.gov/standards/iso639-2/php/code_list.php
properties.title: Language

properties.description: A summary of the content of the resource.
properties.title: Description

properties.description: A designation of a particular physical presentation of a resource, including the physical form or medium of material for a resource.
properties.title: Form

properties.description: A statement of the number and specific material of the units of the resource that express physical extent.
properties.title: Extent

properties.description: Unique standard numbers or codes that distinctively identify the resource.
properties.title: Identifiers

properties.description: General textual information relating to a resource.
properties.title: Note

properties.description: Information about restrictions imposed on access to a resource.
properties.title: Access Conditions
